website_summaries.verdict: An LED option with an amazing battery life when used in flashing mode.
pros: LED light operates in 4 different modes: flashlight, glow stick, flashing, and dual flashlight/glow mode
cons: Some customers dislike this light's auto shutoff feature
Some report they were able to replace batteries themselves
others say it must go back to manufacturer

customer_reviews.title: Another great camping gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought these at a value price as camping gifts for my grandchildren. All 6 worked perfectly. Nice product at that price for that purpose - flashlight, green wand for retaining night vision yet seeing things more clearly, a safety whistle, and a lanyard. Kids loved them. Of course a downside is that the button cells that power this can be pricey (try buying them at the Dollar Store), and it takes some care and a tiny Philips driver to replace them. Finally, be careful when storing this away, the power on button can be pushed by other stuff pressing on it. All in all, another great camping gift for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas CoffeyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Well made, Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these glow sticks. I purchase them in bulk and hand them out as party favors at our camping birthday parties. They can be used as flashlights, glow sticks, strobe lights, and both a flash light and glow stick at the same time. The price is reasonable considering what you would pay for just a disposable glow stick or flashlight. Well worth the money, well made, and so far...durable! We purchased them in red, blue, and green and have used them to identify teams when playing dusk laser tag outside!
customer_reviews.author: NEHNS

customer_reviews.title: works great in your hand but attach it to something and it auto shuts off after about 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: nice for basic things but used for lobster hunting and they were garbage. they seem to auto shut off after a series of time and left me hunting down traps without lights on many occasions so i cant advise it for that use. for normal operations where you can turn it on and off, im sure its awesome
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: AUTO-SHUT OFF
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hang in witches hats on our porch for Halloween. While it served its purpose I was a little frustrated that they had an automatic shut off after 30 minute I think, so all night I kept having to go turn them back on. Also I ordered two sets of six and there was one in each order that did not work. I didn't try replacing batteries, but I shouldn't have to. Didn't have time to return them and just didn't do as many hats. I went back to the product description and no where that I could find did it say anything about the auto shut off. Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Although I was really just buying them for the red flare setting, I am using all of the different light settings. You can replace the batteries if they die (LR44). The included straps are more like ribbons, and I’m not sure how well they will hold up in rugged use, but there were extra ribbons included. I will most likely purchase the green version as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: never ever do they stay waterproof, they always leak.
customer_reviews.text: tried these on lobster floats. so they are not submerged, but do get wet with salt water. they leak, they also do not stay on, they turn off on their own. the leaking part leads to shorting and then they dont work...
customer_reviews.author: apple pie

customer_reviews.title: These suck!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these for lobstering!!!! They work great for about 5 to 10 minutes and then they turn off it’s a rip off. Glow sticks last more than eight hours. I would think just having the Promar name would make them good light sticks but they’re not. I tried to turn them on this morning and only one of 12 work and then shut off after 10 minutes I ended up throwing them in the trash. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great safety lights
customer_reviews.text: Great safety lights. I have these stashed all over my vehicles and home. Also great to throw around the kid's necks for camping and outdoor activities. They can take a little bit of abuse, but not a lot. I wish that the lanyard part that attaches to the light was more sturdy; mine keep breaking. Overall, they are great! You need a few lying around.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt C.

customer_reviews.title: Chemical free glow stick. That lasts. With a flashlight!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as stocking suffers for our boys. Perfect flashlights with great features.. chemical free glow stick, flashlight, safety strobe light, and whistle all on a removable lanyard. The glow stick can be used at the same time as either of the flashlight modes. Battery powered and they offer a free replacement battery through the mail. These are now camping, safety, and Halloween essentials.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: So close...
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking for something to replacing glow sticks. And this product is almost perfect. I love the form factor, and the colored light. It's almost perfect. Unfortunately, they also have an auto shutoff after an hour. Presumably this is to conserve battery, it's hard to mark trails when they keep turning off.
customer_reviews.author: seph

customer_reviews.title: Nice when they work.
customer_reviews.text: They kind of do what they say they will do, but you get what you pay for. They do not like to stay on for long periods - often just shut off for no reason, and sometimes do not want to stay on the setting you leave them on. Any dew or moisture kills them rather instantly, even if its just light morning dew. If you are looking for more or less disposable lights for short term, they will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan1981

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to keep in my horse trailer for if I would ever need them
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect BIrthday Party Thank you
customer_reviews.text: We gave these as the thank you gift for my son's birthday party. The boys all loved them (though I'm sure some of the parent's hated the whistle). It's was nice to give a gift that can be so usefull for campouts, backup flashlight by the kids bed in case of power outages, etc... My youngest takes one with us when we travel to use as nightligt. THe glow stick is bright enough to give comfort but not so bright that it annoys the rest of us if we are sharing a hotel room.
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Good lighting but stopped working correctly during first use!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a decoration. They time out after about 20-30 min. After turning back on a few times they’d only last about 5 minutes. Would be way better if you could just leave them on if you chose to.
customer_reviews.author: Denise HTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: handy little fellas
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift to those who attended a workshop on safety. I think they were well appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Coming Soon

customer_reviews.title: Get extra for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: These are very handy for automotive accessories. I also let my kids use them for Halloween. Unfortunately I have trouble keeping rhem in my car because my kids love to play with them lol. That is why I bought the multi pack. Like I said, great accessories and come in very handy when having roadside problems.
customer_reviews.author: C W

customer_reviews.title: A reliable light
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights to throw into your backpack. They give enough light to see without blinding you at night. I also keep one in each car.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: They looked great when they showed up, not sure on the lumen rating but they are bright enough to walk the dog or turn on the green light to do some night fishing. I wouldn't want to trek the woods at night with this as my only light but if I had to it would work! Got several for the vehicles and camping bags
customer_reviews.author: Suburban Guy

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay on.
customer_reviews.text: These apparently turn off on their own after a short time. I used them to mark some lobster buoys and almost lost them in the dark. Back to the drawing board.

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves glowsticks. We have tried a few others and they stop working very shortly after purchase. The Life Gear glowsticks actually work and keep working. The multicolor is not as bright as the single color ones. Therefore, for use other than a toy I recommend the single color glowsticks. For a toy of kids, or visibility when walking at night, this one is fine.
customer_reviews.author: sabreman

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 6
customer_reviews.text: Well just like other reviews said, only the green flash lights are bright enough to work as a flash lights. The others will be ok for glow sticks. Also when I opened the package one of the red lights were already on so I'm sure the battery life will be greatly limited
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lowe

customer_reviews.title: handy safety item for cruising
customer_reviews.text: we carry these on cruises, you never know when you might need a light, whistle, or past on off to a fellow shipmate who may have a child that needs attention, just don't point out the whistle
customer_reviews.author: MMCM Ret. Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Night light stays on for about 5 minutes and then goes off thought it was just one of them everyone I bought this the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these flashlights
customer_reviews.text: Love these flashlights! Perfect for volunteers during our annual Halloween Parade ... Love the safety feature and the light is extremely strong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice glow stick
customer_reviews.text: Some came with dead batteries, and the lanyards feel apart. Otherwise the glow stick worked great for night time events. Side note: kids will find the whistle and it would be nice to have a model without it. I know it is a safety option and all, but the whistle gets annoying awfully quick.
customer_reviews.author: Suduku

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: They aren't as bright as I had hoped, but they are still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: ljw

customer_reviews.title: I gave one of these to each of our employees ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave one of these to each of our employees. They will last much longer than traditional chemical glow sticks in the event of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Prince

customer_reviews.title: LOW Quality control - special LR44 batteries!
customer_reviews.text: ugh...how about 3 reasons... 1. 5/6 sent do not work. 2. attempts to change to fresh set of LR44 is useless as LR44 batteries will not fit without a special nipple on the neg side. 3. Color shipped is GREEN instead of RED
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Shake these too hard and they stop working. Flimsy, terrible flashlights.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Ok product - lasted about 12 hours with full brightness
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a good product. I got this because I thought the battery could be easily replaced but the S&H costs to get the battery changed are ridiculous. The battery lasted about 12 hours at full brightness then got pretty dim after that.
customer_reviews.author: Zach L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We used these for camping for the kids to use to walk to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Our kids love playing with these on summer nights
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love playing with these on summer nights. They are fun to give as gifts or stocking stuffers to friends. Each family member has a designated solid color glow stick in case of emergency, but these color-changing glow sticks are their favorites.
customer_reviews.author: family history buff

customer_reviews.title: Good for carrying around. not good for putting on bouy's
customer_reviews.text: they work as intended but dont use these for marking bouys for your crab/ lobster traps. they turn off on their own after 20-30 min or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were great as always
customer_reviews.text: They were great as always, and a major help at the National Astronomy Day Sky Watch event. Toward the end, even the kids were using them as they approached our scopes.
customer_reviews.author: Russell A. Ligeikis

customer_reviews.title: I thought these were a cool idea. Bought 12 of these (6 red
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were a cool idea. Bought 12 of these (6 red, 6 green) to give to friends to wear at an outdoor camping festival. Most of them died within the first few nights. By the end of the week all were unreliable or not working at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, NO PROBLEMS
customer_reviews.text: GREAT, NO PROBLEMS, GOOD PRICE AND GOOD PRODUCT, THESE ARE SO COOL, HAVE A EMERGENCY WHISTLE THAT IS LOUD, SEVERAL OPTIONS ON THE LIGHT, I BOUGHT THEM FOR A KIDS SLUMBER PARTY AND IT WAS A HIT
customer_reviews.author: nancy bass

customer_reviews.title: Great for cheap blinkers on dogs and backpacks.
customer_reviews.text: All 6 work great. I put one in my car, my backpack, on my dogs leash, my Fiance's car, and a few in some emergency kits. I enjoy how cheap and effective they are as blinking lights in the dark Alaskan winter.
customer_reviews.author: Austen

customer_reviews.title: Chemlight replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Uses three small button batteries (not difficult to find) Multiple settings to include small white bulb at the bases to color stick and flashlight to only colored stick to flashing color stick. Great use for emergencies
customer_reviews.author: Cisco M.

customer_reviews.title: Safety first!
customer_reviews.text: Definitly a must for all occasions; driving, hiking or just a little walk around the neighborhood. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: I would have been a lot less disappointed if the ad page simply said
customer_reviews.text: One out of the 6 appears to actually light up as intended, 3 of the six, the batteries were so low that that they barely glow at all. 2 of the 6 were somewhere in between. I would have been a lot less disappointed if the ad page simply said, needs new batteries, or batteries not included.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Moody

customer_reviews.title: flashy
customer_reviews.text: these a tad bit different then the other style of these lights. normally the handle of the light would stay on solid which makes for a great pocket lantern. these ones don't, its a flash strobe of rainbows. not bad light just not good for what i need it for but the kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Very Good service, Fast
customer_reviews.text: Very Good service,Fast. Light are very good. I use them for the grandkids while out for Halloween, and while walking the dogs while dark. Green light shows up very good in the dark. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Edkoz106

customer_reviews.title: I love these things!
customer_reviews.text: We must have ten..in the house..in the car! I even wear it around my neck while walking the dog in the early, dark morning. They are fantastic. The kids each have one by their bedside and everyone is getting one for christmas. They were essential in getting us through the week of darkness we spent post-sandy.
customer_reviews.author: Kati A.

customer_reviews.title: Auto shut off
customer_reviews.text: They work great minus the auto shut off! I was using them for witch hats but they turned off after 20 minutes. :(
customer_reviews.author: Melanie S.

customer_reviews.title: for camping kids
customer_reviews.text: These are great. they have a few fun features. each comes with a cord to attach that you can hang on your neck, they light up and change colors which is kind of neat for the kids. there is also a flashlight as well as a whistle on it. you can also make the colored light flash.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Safe & handy safety light
customer_reviews.text: But should have paid attention to battery type because that will make it more expensive. Lights were easy to work - did not need ro read instructs. Liked the breakaway strap. GREAT packaging! 9/2015: I bought 2nd set to give to grandson and friends for Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and a Must have for you Auto, Home or Camping
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and a must have for your Auto, Home, Emergency bag and Camping trips
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose lights
customer_reviews.text: We bought these initially to use when guiding our travel trailer when backing up. They work fine for that and also for the kids at halloween, as temporary markers for nighttime hazards, and as a regular flashlight. Plenty bright in either mode.
customer_reviews.author: RDR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Useful to have in case of emergency. It's in our emergency preparedness backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Life After Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Glow Sticks
customer_reviews.text: Very good to have in auto, camping gear, or around the house.
customer_reviews.author: great granny

customer_reviews.title: Great for night fishing
customer_reviews.text: Use these attached to fishing pole for night fishing. They work awesome. The only drawback is that they can turn on by simply tossing them in a box, bag, ground, etc. Probably the reason for the dead batteries on prior reviews.
customer_reviews.author: hdeshner

customer_reviews.title: Replaced several items in my backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile light stick with different modes to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Yazell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE glow stick / flashlight / emergency whistle
customer_reviews.text: We take them on walks at night, keep them in the cars, kids use them on Halloween instead of glow sticks. These things are great!
customer_reviews.author: motobo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ground guide.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Bought these so I could see my ground guide when Im backing up my trailer. I keep a pair in the truck and a pair in each trailer. Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: phalcon45

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off after 45 min to 1 hour.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Shuts off after 45 min to 1 hour.... They need to update description. Doesn't make sense why they need to have an autoshutoff when it stays on for 200 hours....
customer_reviews.author: Tailgate Specialists

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Bright Blue
customer_reviews.text: Bright - great for attaching to my dogs leash on a dark night ... drivers can't miss us. Versatile and handy
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Grest for night time walks
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of lighting options these light sticks possess. I gifted them out to many of my friends and family
customer_reviews.author: Judy Schiffer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These were gifts, but got the highest praise, especially for hiking, camping, or other outside activities, especially if poor lighting conditions! (red)
customer_reviews.author: McLeSk

customer_reviews.title: Unique light product, excellent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for walking dog at night, has 4 options, flashlight, flashlight and glow stick, flashing glow stick and solid glow stick. Allows for safety during night walking and would be perfect for children at night walks or bycycle rides. Best light I have ever found
customer_reviews.author: Al Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, great for fun or safety
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for my vehicles and am confident and happy with my purchase. They come with a lifetime battery replacement which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Grandkid Approved
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love these! Lots of fun out by the pool at night!
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Bliss

customer_reviews.title: these suck
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use while fishing and every one will shut off right around 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combo
customer_reviews.text: Gave these out as sticking stuffers for Christmas and they were a big hit. Perfect addition to your camping supplies or any emergency bag!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewingit

customer_reviews.title: Glow sticks good to have around for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend these (of any color of your choice) to keep in home, car and office for emergencies. They are easy to use and very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Too small...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the features and various color options, but I did NOT appreciate that I was meant to believe that the size of this product was going to be larger than it actually is. It should include a exact size/length or at least the word "small" in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My customer experience was easily the gold standard!
customer_reviews.text: The product and my customer experience was above and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Minderbinder

customer_reviews.title: Life Gear LG128COM 4 in 1 LED Glow stick Flashlights, Multi-Color
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these 4 in one glow stick flashlights. They are multipurpose and just plain fun. Great for adults or kids.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Goerzen

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy and then change the batteries in 4 out of 6 of these lights. I am just so happy that I checked that they worked before leaving on my trip (the trip was the whole reason I bought these).
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Papantoniou

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Used it for Halloween but will use as a road side emergency item as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved these the last time I ordered, but this batch didn't last nearly as long!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Servello

customer_reviews.title: Great for crossing streets in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: Great for walking in the dark and crossing the street. Easy to switch modes from flashing to using the flashlight. Can store in handbag easily.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Works as advertised. (Tip: You can invert the light and have a white glow stick.)
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: great fun flashlites.
customer_reviews.text: All of them worked. Used them as stocking stuffers for xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We really like these and they are GREAT for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlyn B. Brohn

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the product
customer_reviews.text: I saw these flashlights for sale at Target in 2 packs - but this 6-pack was much more economical. They work great and were a big hit as a party favor for my daughter's birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Anne C. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great little safety item to put in your family's cars
customer_reviews.text: Great little safety item to put in your family's cars. However, I bought one primarily to give to my 2 year old grandson because He Loves It !!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ottman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for night time at a music festival. My crew loved these light sticks!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nigliazzo

customer_reviews.title: For the money they are a great deal.
customer_reviews.text: They were so popular that I ended up giving away all the lights but I did keep one for my car. For the money they are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great For Kids Parties
customer_reviews.text: Fits into grab bags. Kids love them. Each comes with a "Break Free" neck strap.Just let them know about the whistle on them as they leave!
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel or emergency. Blue is best
customer_reviews.text: The Blue color is best. I have bunch of these in case of emergency. Blue light is the most visible, cast the widest illumination and is easiest on the eyes. I also always throw one in my travel bag when I am overseas. It has come in handy many, many times. And they weigh next to nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Tampaman

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a sleepover
customer_reviews.text: One of the flashlights had a broken button, but apart from that they were ideal for a sleepover party. (Beware the loud whistle though!)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. The lights are very bright. Whistle is an added protection. I gave one to each family member.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: These are so wonderful. I am freaking out that I can't seem ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so wonderful. I am freaking out that I can't seem to find more. Every time I go out people want one!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Krakus

customer_reviews.title: perfect inexpensive bright enough be able to find things in ...
customer_reviews.text: These are everything you cold need in a small glow stick for the kids, perfect inexpensive bright enough be able to find things in the dark
customer_reviews.author: Terrence C Venchus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to be seen during the night (bike, festival, etc)
customer_reviews.author: Roesch Ferdinand

customer_reviews.title: One was defective
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these in assorted colors for party bags for my son's birthday, they arrived quickly and were exactly what I expected. However, we just had the party, and we had one disappointed partygoer, whose blue glow stick/light only worked on flashlight mode, and nothing else. Unfortunately I am past the return deadline, and I was unable to find a link to 'contact the seller' (Amazon). Pleased for the most part, but didn't get all I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of 6 didnt work but replacements came fast
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find anywhere whether each one was multi-colored, or if it was a random multi-colored pack. I guessed wrong, each one is the same rainbow strobe. Mrah. They work fine though. Curious if I can try to set them to one color somehow :?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Q.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as described. The only problem is that one of the lights does not work and I am expecting to hear back from the shipper
customer_reviews.author: Larry Wall

customer_reviews.title: Dad with kids at night
customer_reviews.text: Thes lights are great. Several colors with steady and blink mode. Only problem is loose battery connections. Tape them together and they are fine, 2 out of the 6 needed additional fiddling to make work properly. Because china made isn't that precise but its cheap. You get whT you pay for sometimes. I would buy more and fix as needed for the price! Kids love them from 3 to 15years old.
customer_reviews.author: Autolex

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 of the 12 had the perfect intensity. The rest had a different sticker, perhaps from a different batch, and only lit up a bit on the red light setting. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Leingang

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to complete Halloween decorations and cheaper than buying @ Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing substitutes for chem-lights for an airsoft loadout as well ...
customer_reviews.text: These came in within a matter of days! These are amazing substitutes for chem-lights for an airsoft loadout as well as emergency purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for Crew safety for the race to Mackinac island this year this was the best with all the options available from the light to the glow stick. Highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. I lost 2 lobster hoop nets because the ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I lost 2 lobster hoop nets because the lights did not work after 20-30 min in the ocean. I will try to get my money back but I am not sure if I wil get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Operated Light Sticks
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled when I found these, whereas I was going thru so many regular, one-time-use glow sticks. These battery operated light sticks are of great quality and at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: R. N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Nulti Use item to have in the glove box or give as gifts
customer_reviews.text: Great item, better than flares. Great for emergency kits for the car easly will fit into basic glovebox, door map holder. Great gift for new car owner, someone going on a road trip, camping, multi use item!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

product_meta.title: Life Gear 6 Pack BLUE LED Light Stick, Reusable Glow Stick or Glow Wand | Emergency Safety Glow Stick, Flashlight and Whistle
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue 6-PackThe Life Gear 4 in 1 LED Glow Stick Flashlight is an everyday product that could someday save your life. Battery operated, chemical free and the glow stick is the ultimate Go Green accessory you will use for your many adventures from hiking, boating and camping to parties, concerts or just having fun in the dark. The Glow Stick features a 200 hour LED Glow Stick, LED emergency flasher, LED flashlight and emergency whistle. Life Gear is dedicated to working hands-on at every level to develop and promote innovative everyday products engineered with life saving capabilities. Life Gear - Prepare for Life.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Life Gear 4 in 1 LED Glow Stick Flashlight is an everyday product that could someday save your life. Battery operated, chemical free, the glow stick is the ultimate Go Green accessory you will use for your many adventures from hiking, boating and camping to parties, concerts or just having fun in the dark. The Glow Stick features a 200 hour LED Glow Stick, LED emergency flasher, LED flashlight and emergency whistle. Life Gear is dedicated to working hands-on at every level to develop and promote innovative everyday products engineered with life saving capabilities. Life Gear - Prepare for Life.
feature_bullets: 4 LIGHT MODES: Switch between an LED flashlight, glow mode with LED flashlight, glow light stick, and flasher mode.
SAFETY: Use your LED safety light stick as a led road flare, glow stick or flashing light wand. Light includes safety whistle & detachable lanyard.
LED LIGHT LIFE: Long lasting LED light, 200 hours of use in flasher mode
Includes 6 Life Gear reusable LED light glow sticks with batteries
Use when camping, hiking, trick or treating, walking the dog and much more!

specifications.Warranty Description: Life+Gear products have been designed based on the highest quality standards and are warranted against defects in material and workmanship for one year from the date of purchase. Damages caused by misuse, alteration or normal wear and tear are not covered
